Player History
Drafted in 18th round, 273rd overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Timothy Egerton (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2015, off Michael Coronel (PHI)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/25/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,500 per year...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/3/2016...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 6/17/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2017, hitting .421 with 3 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2017, hitting .560 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 8/1/2017 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2017, hitting .452 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
